DOC.brief_title: Study In Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Who Are Taking Metformin And Sulfonylurea , Metformin And Insulin , Or Insulin
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Must diagnose Type 2 diabetes least three month prior screen . Must take either metformin sulfonylurea , metformin insulin , insulin , dose medication must stable least three month . Must Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 24 35 . If female , subject must postmenopausal . HbA1c level must 7 % 10 % . Subjects must eligible MRI scan ( ie , metal implant , pacemaker , etc ) . Exclusion criterion : Suffer claustrophobia . Use tobacco , nicotine , illegal drug abuse . Use caffeine within two day prior study visit .
